channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 15:32 Air alert in Poltava region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 15:32 Air alert in Poltava region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Полтавська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 14:09 Free evacuation will be urgently evacuated from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region.
